import Head from '../../components/Head' import Header from 'next/head' import Nav from '../../components/Nav' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import fetch from 'node-fetch' import Link from 'next/link' import Loader from '../../components/Loader' const fetcher =async (url)=>{const r = await fetch(url) return r.json()} const submitHandler = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.currentTarget().value) } const All =(props)=>{ const {post} = props; return( <> {post.caption} {post.link}
) } export async function getServerSideProps() { console.log(`${process.env.HOST}/api/posts`) const data = await fetcher(`http://localhost:3000/api/posts`) return { props: { data } } } function Index (props) { const {data} = props const allObj = data.posts.map((post)=>) return (

All Posts

{allObj}
Captions link Edit delete
) } export default Index
